nodes.text: Closed Circuits is a short story in the Living Force campaign for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game. It was written by August and Cynthia Hahn and was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on February 9, 2006.

Gamma Squad, composed of five Republic clone commandos is dispatched to infiltrate the droid manufacturing plant on Uffel. Fighting their way through numerous droids, they breach the command center and using its communications center, they transmit a signal that modified all droids produced by the factory to allow for remote Galactic Republic control.
